category: news
title: "Rafael and Group 42 Form New JV to Develop Commercial AI and Big Data Technologies"
excerpt: "Rafael Advanced Defense Systems Ltd. of Israel, and Group 42 (G42), a leading technology company based in Abu Dhabi, announced today the signing of an agreement to form a new Joint Venture (JV) that will commercialize Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Big Data technologies and solutions for multiple sectors."
